languages.text:
Using {g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}Purification Discharge{/g} also connects the enemies to Psyber Raven. {uip|SharedDamage|1054900271274ed5a11b7a8c5b1406d8}% (up to 100%) of the next attack damage one of them receives also affects the others as Mental damage.
An enemy can only be connected to one Psyber Raven at a time.

traits.locale_text:
Using {g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}Purification Discharge{/g} also connects the enemies to Psyber Raven. {uip|SharedDamage|1054900271274ed5a11b7a8c5b1406d8}% (up to 100%) of the next attack damage one of them receives also affects the others as Mental damage.
An enemy can only be connected to one Psyber Raven at a time.

languages.text: Whenever {g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}Purification Discharge{/g} is used, the affected targets suffer {g|f:70a18b24f69f4dfb905cb3d9420d0b19}bonds of pain{/g}, connecting them with the psyber-raven. At any time, an enemy can only be connected to a single psyber-raven.

traits.locale_text: Whenever {g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}Purification Discharge{/g} is used, the affected targets suffer {g|f:70a18b24f69f4dfb905cb3d9420d0b19}bonds of pain{/g}, connecting them with the psyber-raven. At a time, an enemy can only be connected to a single psyber-raven.

Whenever {g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}Purification Discharge{/g} is used, the affected targets suffer {g|f:70a18b24f69f4dfb905cb3d9420d0b19}bonds of pain{/g}, connecting them with the psyber-raven. At any time, an enemy can only be connected to a single psyber-raven.

Whenever {g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}Purification Discharge{/g} is used, the affected targets suffer {g|f:70a18b24f69f4dfb905cb3d9420d0b19}bonds of pain{/g}, connecting them with the psyber-raven. At any time, an enemy can only be connected to a single psyber-raven.

languages.text: Cada vez que se use la {g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}Descarga purificadora{/g}, los objetivos afectados sufren {g|f:70a18b24f69f4dfb905cb3d9420d0b19}vínculos de dolor{/g} que los conectan al psicocuervo. Cada enemigo solo puede estar conectado de este modo a un único psicocuervo.
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}Purification Discharge{/g} is used, the affected targets suffer {g|f:70a18b24f69f4dfb905cb3d9420d0b19}bonds of pain{/g}, connecting them with the psyber-raven. At any time, an enemy can only be connected to a single psyber-raven.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que se use la {g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}Descarga purificadora{/g}, los objetivos afectados sufren {g|f:70a18b24f69f4dfb905cb3d9420d0b19}vínculos de dolor{/g} que los conectan al psicocuervo. Cada enemigo solo puede estar conectado de este modo a un único psicocuervo.

languages.text: 每当使用{g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}净化释能{/g}时，受影响的所有目标都会受到{g|f:70a18b24f69f4dfb905cb3d9420d0b19}痛苦枷锁{/g}效果影响，与生化渡鸦之间建立联结。每名敌人最多只能与一只生化渡鸦建立联结。
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}Purification Discharge{/g} is used, the affected targets suffer {g|f:70a18b24f69f4dfb905cb3d9420d0b19}bonds of pain{/g}, connecting them with the psyber-raven. At any time, an enemy can only be connected to a single psyber-raven.

traits.locale_text: 每当使用{g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}净化释能{/g}时，受影响的所有目标都会受到{g|f:70a18b24f69f4dfb905cb3d9420d0b19}痛苦枷锁{/g}效果影响，与生化渡鸦之间建立联结。每名敌人最多只能与一只生化渡鸦建立联结。

languages.text: Dès que {g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}Décharge purificatrice{/g} est déclenchée, les cibles affectées souffrent de l'effet {g|f:70a18b24f69f4dfb905cb3d9420d0b19}Liens douloureux{/g} qui les lie à la psyber-corneille. Un ennemi ne peut jamais être lié à plus d'une psyber-corneille.
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}Purification Discharge{/g} is used, the affected targets suffer {g|f:70a18b24f69f4dfb905cb3d9420d0b19}bonds of pain{/g}, connecting them with the psyber-raven. At any time, an enemy can only be connected to a single psyber-raven.

traits.locale_text: Dès que {g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}Décharge purificatrice{/g} est déclenchée, les cibles affectées souffrent de l'effet {g|f:70a18b24f69f4dfb905cb3d9420d0b19}Liens douloureux{/g} qui les lie à la psyber-corneille. Un ennemi ne peut jamais être lié à plus d'une psyber-corneille.

languages.text: Her {g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}Arınma Salınımı{/g} kullanıldığında etkilenen hedefler, {g|f:70a18b24f69f4dfb905cb3d9420d0b19}acı bağlarına{/g} maruz kalıp ruhsiber kuzguna bağlanırlar. Bir düşman, aynı anda yalnızca bir ruhsiber kuzguna bağlanabilir.
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}Purification Discharge{/g} is used, the affected targets suffer {g|f:70a18b24f69f4dfb905cb3d9420d0b19}bonds of pain{/g}, connecting them with the psyber-raven. At any time, an enemy can only be connected to a single psyber-raven.

traits.locale_text: Her {g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}Arınma Salınımı{/g} kullanıldığında etkilenen hedefler, {g|f:70a18b24f69f4dfb905cb3d9420d0b19}acı bağlarına{/g} maruz kalıp ruhsiber kuzguna bağlanırlar. Bir düşman, aynı anda yalnızca bir ruhsiber kuzguna bağlanabilir.

languages.text: Когда псайберворон применяет {g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}Очистительный разряд{/g}, цели оказываются связаны с ним {g|f:70a18b24f69f4dfb905cb3d9420d0b19}узами боли{/g}. Одновременно цель может быть связана только с одним псайбервороном.
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}Purification Discharge{/g} is used, the affected targets suffer {g|f:70a18b24f69f4dfb905cb3d9420d0b19}bonds of pain{/g}, connecting them with the psyber-raven. At any time, an enemy can only be connected to a single psyber-raven.

traits.locale_text: Когда псайберворон применяет {g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}Очистительный разряд{/g}, цели оказываются связаны с ним {g|f:70a18b24f69f4dfb905cb3d9420d0b19}узами боли{/g}. Одновременно цель может быть связана только с одним псайбервороном.

Когда псайберворон применяет {g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}Очистительный разряд{/g}, цели оказываются связаны с ним {g|f:70a18b24f69f4dfb905cb3d9420d0b19}узами боли{/g}. Одновременно цель может быть связана только с одним псайбервороном.

languages.text: {g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}浄化の放電{/g} が使用されるたび、影響を受けた対象は{g|f:70a18b24f69f4dfb905cb3d9420d0b19}苦痛の絆{/g} を受け、サイバー＝レイヴンと結ばれる。敵はいつでも1体のサイ バー・レイヴンとしか繋がれない。
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}Purification Discharge{/g} is used, the affected targets suffer {g|f:70a18b24f69f4dfb905cb3d9420d0b19}bonds of pain{/g}, connecting them with the psyber-raven. At any time, an enemy can only be connected to a single psyber-raven.

traits.locale_text: {g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}Purification Discharge{/g} が使用されるたび、影響を受けた対象は{g|f:70a18b24f69f4dfb905cb3d9420d0b19}苦痛の絆{/g} を受け、サイバー＝レイヴンと結ばれる。敵はいつでも1体のサイ バー・レイヴンとしか繋がれない。

languages.text: Wird {g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}Reinigende Entladung{/g} eingesetzt, erleiden die betroffenen Ziele {g|f:70a18b24f69f4dfb905cb3d9420d0b19}Schmerzensbande{/g}, was sie mit dem Psitech-Raben verbindet. Es kann immer nur ein Gegner mit einem Psitech-Raben verbunden sein.
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}Purification Discharge{/g} is used, the affected targets suffer {g|f:70a18b24f69f4dfb905cb3d9420d0b19}bonds of pain{/g}, connecting them with the psyber-raven. At any time, an enemy can only be connected to a single psyber-raven.

traits.locale_text: Wird {g|f:7962a71f962946258a64df9cd4b7c36a}Reinigende Entladung{/g} eingesetzt, erleiden die betroffenen Ziele {g|f:70a18b24f69f4dfb905cb3d9420d0b19}Schmerzensbande{/g}, was sie mit dem Psitech-Raben verbindet. Es kann immer nur ein Gegner mit einem Psitech-Raben verbunden sein.
